body_html: In that case there is something wrong with your CUDA installation. CUDA should come with libcublas.so in the lib64 subdirectory. My CUDA 9.1 installation has it, so should yours. Try to reinstall CUDA?
body_text: In that case there is something wrong with your CUDA installation. CUDA should come with libcublas.so in the lib64 subdirectory. My CUDA 9.1 installation has it, so should yours. Try to reinstall CUDA?
body: In that case there is something wrong with your CUDA installation. CUDA should come with `libcublas.so` in the `lib64` subdirectory. My CUDA 9.1 installation has it, so should yours. Try to reinstall CUDA?
